How To Make A Mod

This is an overview document intended to answer the most basic question, “How do I make a mod?” This isn’t to teach how to code, or create 3D models, but rather how to set up a mod so that it will run in Half-Life. Each mod has different components from other mods: some have new weapons, some new maps, some new monsters. There are just a few basic things that all mods must have, and this document is meant to outline what those are. Read all

Event System in SDK 2.2

One of the major additions to the SDK is the client event system. The event system allows a MOD to conserve network bandwidth by creating a shorthand code that is used to playback on the client an arbitrarily complex set of events, such as temporary entity creation, sound effects, animations, etc. Read all
